name: TRansaction Agent Modelling
short_description: TRansaction Agent Modelling (TRAM) is a framework for the development of Multi-Agent Systems (MAS). This framework consists of documentation for a MAS, plus a suite of software to enable interoperability between existing Open Source design tools.
